teaser: Airing on Monday, January 19, 2015: Later this year, in an attempt to be better prepared for future cyber-security breaches, the governments of the U.S. and the UK will team up for the first time to simulate large scale cyber attacks. But exercises like this aren’t new to the private sector, where you can pay firms to test your company’s digital defenses. We'll also talk to tech journalist Sarah Jeong about the first week of the Silk Road trial.
description: Airing on Monday, January 19, 2015: Later this year, in an attempt to be better prepared for future cyber-security breaches, the governments of the U.S. and the UK will team up for the first time to simulate large scale cyber attacks. But exercises like this aren’t new to the private sector, where you can pay firms to test your company’s digital defenses. We'll also talk to tech journalist Sarah Jeong about the first week of the Silk Road trial.
byline: Nova Safo, Bruce Johnson and Aparna Alluri
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, January 19, 2015
